verses.text: \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="G3198"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Salem|strong="G4532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Most|strong="G5310"\w* \w High|strong="G5310"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w met|strong="G4876"\w* Abraham \w returning|strong="G5290"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w slaughter|strong="G2871"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w kings|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*,

\w Without|strong="G2316"\w* father \w or|strong="G3383"\w* mother \w or|strong="G3383"\w* genealogy, \w without|strong="G2316"\w* beginning \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w or|strong="G3383"\w* \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w like|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w remains|strong="G3306"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G1161"\w* \w time|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Consider|strong="G2334"\w* \w how|strong="G1161"\w* \w great|strong="G4080"\w* Melchizedek \w was|strong="G3588"\w*: \w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w patriarch|strong="G3966"\w* Abraham \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w tenth|strong="G1181"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* plunder.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="G1075"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* trace \w his|strong="G2192"\w* descent \w from|strong="G1537"\w* Levi, \w collected|strong="G1183"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w tenth|strong="G1183"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* Abraham \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blessed|strong="G2127"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w promises|strong="G1860"\w*.

\w He|strong="G3739"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* belonged \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w a|strong="G1909"\w* \w different|strong="G2087"\w* \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w*, \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w ever|strong="G3762"\w* served \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w altar|strong="G2379"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* clear \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2962"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* descended \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Judah|strong="G2455"\w*, \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w tribe|strong="G5443"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w said|strong="G2980"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* priesthood.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* point \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w more|strong="G2089"\w* clear \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w like|strong="G2596"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="G3198"\w* appears,

\w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w has|strong="G3739"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* priest \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* succession, \w but|strong="G3551"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G2596"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w an|strong="G1096"\w* indestructible \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w testified|strong="G3140"\w*: “\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G1519"\w* \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w forever|strong="G1519"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w order|strong="G5010"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w Melchizedek|strong="G3198"\w*.”

\w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w former|strong="G4254"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w set|strong="G2532"\w* aside \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* weak \w and|strong="G2532"\w* useless

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w oath|strong="G3728"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w oath|strong="G3728"\w*,

\w Because|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G2532"\w* oath, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w has|strong="G1096"\w* \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w guarantee|strong="G1450"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w other|strong="G4183"\w* \w priests|strong="G2409"\w*, \w since|strong="G1223"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w prevented|strong="G2967"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w continuing|strong="G3887"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* office.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w because|strong="G1223"\w* Jesus \w lives|strong="G3306"\w* \w forever|strong="G1519"\w*, \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* permanent \w priesthood|strong="G2420"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w completely|strong="G3838"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w draw|strong="G4334"\w* \w near|strong="G4334"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w since|strong="G1223"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w lives|strong="G2198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w intercede|strong="G1793"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Such|strong="G5108"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w high|strong="G5308"\w* priest truly befits \w us|strong="G1096"\w*—\w One|strong="G5108"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, innocent, undefiled, \w set|strong="G2532"\w* apart \w from|strong="G2532"\w* sinners, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w exalted|strong="G5308"\w* \w above|strong="G5308"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*.
